node.html: Even people perform a sufficient amount of physical activities, uninterrupted sedentary behavior would cause increased waist circumference. This work explores how to provide Just-in-Time support for prevention of prolonged sedentary behavior, including (1) when to deliver JIT support, and (2) how to tailor contents of the support.

frontmatter.title: Just-in-time health intervention for prevention of prolonged sedentary behavior
